divs: sighting details on jan 14, 2012 at approximately 6:20 pm i went for a walk arounf the south half of the rv park where we are spending the winter on the colorado river near parker, az. i had covered about 2\3rds of the route when i noticed a bright, reddish light off to west over the river. i at first thought that it might be a planet that i had failed to notice earlier because there was some light cloud cover. but, the clouds slid behind it and a commercial jet was high over head above it. its height is hard to estimate, maybe 1,200 - 1,500 ft. it was slowly sliding south and gave off no emissions. it did not have any appendiges or emit any sound. it began to ascend as i rounded the corner en route to our 5th wheel. it was now dark.
Summary: Close to dark and was hovering at about 1,500 ft emitting red light and then sliding to the So before ascending
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Parker
There were 2 other sightings in Parker on or around January 14th 2012
